messages.subject: Site of the Ito Dojo
messages.msgSnippet: Tama  has once again come up with some very very cool info for us--the site of the Ito Dojo. Until the info goes up on the main SHQ site you can see the map
messages.messageBody:
Tama has once again come up with some very very cool info for us--the
site of the Ito Dojo. Until the info goes up on the main SHQ site you
can see the map and read more at the link below.
